root: ^Oh! long time no see, stranger. Please, come on in.
^Not that long ago, I did miss you though

c-0: ^Haha, That may be true, but the time I spent apart from you felt far longer than that.
^That may be, but that doesn't mean that it is any less true. It has been a while since I found myself genuinly intriuged by another person.
^Oh? Should I count myself lucky then
^I Belive I'm the lucky one in this scenario, after all, you did agree to a second date with me. In my appartment none the less.
^It's not like I had a choice
^Hah, confidence looks good on you. Makes me wonder what else looks good on you.
^Aw, don't play coy with me now. Oh, By the way did you sleep well last night? I didn't realise I sent my message quite so late.
^That's good to hear, I would hate for eyebags to ruin such a pretty face like yours.
c-1: ^Hmm, Thats unfortunate to hear, Maybe it's bad airflow? You could try sleeping here and see if things imporve, I do have a lot of plants.
c-2: ^Uhm, The message that held the details to todays date? This date? Maybe I did mess upp your sleep sqedule...

c-1: ^I bet you do~  Oh, By the way did you sleep well last night? I didn't realise I sent my message quite so late.

^Sorry, I just had a rough morning
^Whatever, Let's just get this over with

c-0: ^That's fine,but you dont have to take out your anger out on me.
c-1: ^Excuse me? Get this over with? Is this just some kind of obligation to you. Whatever.
^Ah, I apologize if you found our first date a bit lacking. I was honestly caught of guard when I got the notification and picked the first spot I could think of.

c-0: ^I hate to break it to you, but dating is a two way street. If you really didn't like the location you could have come up with another suggestion.
^Wow, you really are impossible huh. Whatever

c-1: ^The fact that I'm nonbinary is usualy enough to put people of from dating me. So ofcourse I'd be suprised when a pretty face like yours decides I'm worth a shot.
^I just kinda picked the first person...

Plants: ^I tried to clean up a bit since I was expecting company, what do you think  of the place?

c-1: ^Ah, still? Hmm, I even took the time to store some of them elsewhere but it seems it might have been all for naught.

c-0: ^Im afriad not, I have managde to accumulate quite a colection theese past years. I even cultivated them myself.

c-1: ^Yup, I did. It took quite and extensive amout of resharshing  to make sure that all of the plant has the correct amout of sunlight, that they got the water needed and that the...Ah, It seems I may be rambling.

c-0: ^That's good to know, But right now I would like to give my full attention to you, rather than my houseplants.
^youre right, Im way more interesting than a plant
^What If I like hearing you rant about plants?
^Even if I dedicated the rest of my life to botany, I doubt anything would even come close to you~ -
c-1: ^I will keep it in mind, but I would also get to know you during our time togther. I will indulge in providing more plant information at another time.

g-0: ^Aw, But I wan't to learn about plants

c-0: ^Haha, Ok, if you insist. Is there any type in particular you would like more infor about.
^That one is one of my favorites. Not only does it have long luscious leaves, But when it's flowers bloom it let out an arouma almost as sweet as you.  -
c-2: ^Did you know that the queen of night, a cactus, have gorgeus white flowers that only bloom once a year? The flowers lifespan is also short, as they will have withered away the following morning.

c-0: ^Ah, well, Guess we can't all admire the wonders of plant life.
^It really is an experiance, if you are interested I could invite you over again when they are due to bloom?
^I'll keep it in mind for you then. -

g-0: ^Maybe you should get rid of some plants?

Drink: ^How rude of me, I got so absrobed in our conversation I forgot to ask, would you like something to drink? I've worked out a way to brew some of my plants into something akin to tea?

c-0: ^Yes, I've been experimenting with different tastes and trying to find the perfect combination. Oh, and that's why i needed that book from the store, I usualy just borrow them from the library otherwise.
^Ahh I see. That's why you needed the book
^Wasn’t the book you got about poisonous plants?
^Yes, precisely! I'm not quite confident enough to start mixing my herbs without some sort of guide. Atleast not if I want it to be safe for consumtion.
^Sounds a little creepy. I think i’ll pass
^Oh simply that some of the plants have a very strong flavour. If not mixed correctly it will come out tasting less like abrew and more like I just shoved leaves down your throat.
^Would you like to try it? I promise it’s really good

c-1: ^Yay, i’ll go get some for you. I’ll be right back. You can hang out here with Basil until i'm back.
c-2: ^Oh okay, I guess that's fine. I’ll just go get some for me. Are you sure you don’t want to try it?
^Actually, I would like to try it!

c-0: ^If you’re sure. I’m gonna go get some for me. I’ll be right back. You can hang out here with basil until I'm back!
c-1: ^Nice, I’ll go get some for you. I’ll be right back, you can hang out here with Basil if you’d like.
^What? Oh that one! yes but it’s not one of the herbs I used. I promise. So should I get you one?
^Oh, okay. I’m still gonna go get one for me. I be right back
^Oh mostly the usual stuff like berries, sugar and other similar things. But I did use some of my herbs to make it taste better. I'm really happy with how it turned out.

c-0: ^Great! I’ll go get one. Be right back! You can have a look around if you’d like
